job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Our client is rethinking the way that code is written. They are well-funded and a team of early
Today, most people write code by sitting at a desk, memorizing a syntax that varies with different tools, and pushing buttons. And, doing so for long periods of time is known to cause physical pain. We'd knowâ€”our client created the company after developing repetitive strain injuries (think carpal tunnel), common among people who use computers all day, that made typing incredibly painful. We're building a future where everyone can write code with the highest-bandwidth input mechanism we have: our voice.
Our mission: make programming more efficient and accessible to everyone.
We're looking for machine learning engineers excited to apply the latest in ASR and NLP to code and build on our speech-to-code platform.
Here's a sample of projects you'd be able to work on from day 1:
